title: Font reset
body: In the CMD prompt I can change font, and the change is remembered. When I do the same in the PowerShell host, the font resets to "raster 7x12" in the next PowerShell Windows I open.

comments.body: Tom, it depends where the shortcut is actually being stored. There has been an issue with shortcuts that are in non-writeable locations. We've resolved many of them, as far as I can recall. If you're still having a specific problem, please send us feedback using the Feedback Tool so you can capture what's going wrong exactly.
You opened from a shortcut or the start menu/screen, right? I'm pretty sure this is a bug and I know what's causing it.
